title: ‘Inspirational’ accolade for Greenwich professor (University of Greenwich)
text: ( Source : University of Greenwich ) Championing the role of women in science has led to a prestigious national prize for a University of Greenwich professor. Adrian Dobbs has received an 'Inspirational Member Award ' from the Royal Society of
